name: Stranger Cases: A Mystery Escape
description:
Can you solve the escape mystery of the missing baby drone?

- A unique, one of a kind detective escape adventure!
- 15 beautiful, hand drawn levels to explore!
- More than 20 original characters to interact with!
- Dozens of challenging quests and original puzzles!
- Laughter guaranteed!
- First 8 levels are free of charge!

In the days of the Jurassic Mice, I decided to become a detective! A hired mind.
My first client was an unusual scientist who lost his baby drone. I went on with my investigation only to find it on the roof of a very peculiar building... With even more peculiar occupants!

If you think you have what it takes to be a cartoon detective, look no further - download and enjoy!
